caption.center: JEFFREY A. HOFFMAN, Respondent/Plaintiff-Appellee v. PAMELA J. HOFFMAN,
Petitioner/Defendant-Appellant and JOHN J. and JODI MEYER,

opinion.posture: CERTIORARI TO THE INTERMEDIATE COURT OF APPEALS (FC-D NO. 99-1001)
opinion.panel: MOON, C.J., LEVINSON, NAKAYAMA, RAMIL, and ACOBA, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text:
ORDER OF AMENDMENT The Order filed on November 15, 2002, is amended as follows (deletions are bracketed and additions are double underscored):
The title of the order:ORDER DISMISSING [APPLICATION FOR] CERTIORARI PROCEEDING
Lines 3-4 from the top of page 5: IT IS HEREBY ORDERED that the [application for] certiorari proceeding is dismissed.
The Clerk of the Court is directed to incorporate the foregoing changes in the original opinion.
